alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 2:31AM MST until January 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds may gust as high as 45 mph tonight and Saturday morning. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. This will be a long duration event with impacts to travel for several days.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
